Summary: Biochemical reaction from codeine to morphine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from morphine to morphine-6-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A8, UGT1A3, UGT2B4, UGT2B7 or UGT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from codeine to norcodeine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.

Controller: UGT1A1, UGT1A10, UGT1A3, UGT1A9, UGT2B15, UGT2B17, UGT2B4, UGT2B7
Summary: Biochemical reaction from morphine to morphine-3-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT2B17, UGT1A9, UGT1A10, UGT2B4, UGT2B15, UGT1A1 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from codeine to codeine-6-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B4 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from morphine to normorphine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C8 or CYP3A4.
Transport from morphine to morphine. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from morphine to morphine. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2 or ABCB1.
Transport from morphine-6-glucuronide to morphine-6-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC3, ABCC2 or ABCB1.
Transport from morphine-3-glucuronide to morphine-3-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2, ABCC3 or ABCB1.
